programme.title: De Patrick
Patrick
De Patrick
programme.desc:
De Patrick: Directed by Tim Mielants. With Kevin Janssens, Katelijne Damen, Hannah Hoekstra, Jemaine Clement. A bereaved nudist campsite handyman finds himself on an existential quest as he attempts to recover his missing favorite hammer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7618604/","name":"De Patrick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI0ZjVkY2ItOTEyMC00ZGE2LWE4ZjgtNjg5OTAxM2E4ZGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ0NTM5MTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bereaved nudist campsite handyman finds himself on an existential quest as he attempts to recover his missing favorite hammer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7618604/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dromasca"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"a lost hammer","reviewBody":"Belgian director Tim Mielants already has an impressive number of episodes in television series on his record. 'Patrick' is his first feature film for the big screen and it is clear the director's effort to liberate himself off the pattern of the fixed formats and themes specific to television shows. The result is a strange and original film, sprinkled with many signs of directorial talent, but which at left me a bit puzzled about what it desired to convey. Of course, Tim Mielants may just have intended to demonstrate his potential, or it might have been me missing some deep meaning buried in inaccessible metaphors. Or is it some Belgian existential spleen? I suggest that you watch the movie and decide.

'Patrick' (or 'De Patrick' in the original version) is the story of a confrontation with mourning. Or maybe it's the story of a lost hammer. Both variants are equally possible, and some more. The story takes place in a summer vacation resort where the vast majority of guests practice nudism. As a result the viewers are permanently confronted with the images of naked or almost naked bodies, but without any sexual connotation. The visual shock works for about five minutes, after which the nudity becomes as trivial as is probably the custom in such a holiday resort. The hero of the film, Patrick, is the janitor of the resort and the son of the owners. His father dies, a death not too unexpected, because he was seriously ill, but Patrick seems rather affected by the lack of one of the hammers in his tool kit, used to create elegant, beautifully finished wooden chairs, worthy the work of select designers. Is this obsessive search of the hammer a way to deal with grief? Is Patrick affected by any mental condition? Or is he just a simple boy who is incapable of communicating, who has not had the time in his 38 years of life to know the world? Or maybe he is doing the most logical thing of all. After all the father's death is irreversible, but the missing hammer can be found, and then his world order is - to the possible extent - restored. The answer is left to the viewers, I have not been able to reach any conclusion.

Patrick's role is played by Kevin Janssens, an actor who also comes with an extensive television experience. His character is closed on itself, but despite the lack of communication or perhaps because of it, he manages to generate empathy. The rest of the distribution contributes to the creation of a strange, slightly absurd atmosphere. The practice of nudism has as an 'ideological' purpose the elimination of social barriers, but the the more naked the characters are, the more anti-socially they behave. What would have been left of the story if the action had not taken place in a nudism village? The story manages to catch the attention for most of the time, oscillating between social satire with absurd and grotesque nuances, and police mystery with hints of horror. There are many interesting elements in Tim Mielants' film, including some scenes in which the nature of the Ardennes with the sun hardly creeping through the trees of dizzying verticality plays an important role. At least one scene, that of the funerals, has a wonderful cinematic beauty. 'Patrick' announces, I hope, the career of a talented director. I hope that he will also find consistent stakes in the subjects of his upcoming films, in order to harness this potential.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1628,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-08-28","keywords":"nudity,male full frontal nudity,male pubic hair,public nudity,nudism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Patrick","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2663038745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg0NGNiZGYtZDcyMS00ZjQ0LTgzZjAtYzI0N2Y4YjNkYTBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg0NGNiZGYtZDcyMS00ZjQ0LTgzZjAtYzI0N2Y4YjNkYTBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1822271/","name":"Kevin Janssens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0198705/","name":"Katelijne Damen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4142492/","name":"Hannah Hoekstra"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2139803/","name":"Tim Mielants"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0364126/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2139803/","name":"Tim Mielants"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2130385/","name":"Benjamin Sprengers"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingpin
Kręglogłowi
Kingpin
programme.desc: Kingpin: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Woody Harrelson, Randy Quaid, Vanessa Angel, Bill Murray. A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116778/","name":"Kingpin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAzODIyMDYwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTUyNTEzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116778/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lambiepie-2"},"dateCreated":"2002-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film is rude, crude and very funny","reviewBody":"When this film first came out, I had no use for it. Then I was home sick one day and caught it on cable. I laughed my butt off. This is a crude, rude and down right funny film. It also helped that I grew up near the Pennsylvania Dutch and plenty of bowling lanes. Two seemingly safe areas that the Farley brothers attack it without mercy. Sometimes it gets down right disgusting and many cannot stomach, but overall, its very funny.\n\nBill and Woody were funny as anything. The Disco-era beginning makes me laugh like crazy. The commercial Bill Murray does is to die for. This film will offend alot of people, and many references played for humor may make folks feel uncomfortable, but I loved it. If you are easily offended, this is NOT the film for you. But for everyone else who likes rude, crude and deviously funny -- often at the expense of others kinda humor, this is a gem to see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80710,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Sport"],"datePublished":"1996-07-26","keywords":"bowling,amish,on the road,big breasts,breasts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi973258265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjIwYWEzNGItNDJjNy00MDIwLWEyODEtMmVkNGY1ZDE0YTYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjIwYWEzNGItNDJjNy00MDIwLWEyODEtMmVkNGY1ZDE0YTYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001642/","name":"Randy Quaid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030480/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071430/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266673/","name":"Barry Fanaro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0622240/","name":"Mort Nathan"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Burn
Ogień
Burn
programme.desc: Burn: Directed by Mike Gan. With Tilda Cobham-Hervey, Josh Hutcherson, Suki Waterhouse, Harry Shum Jr.. When a gas station is held at gunpoint by a desperate man in need of cash, a lonely and unstable gas station attendant, tired of being overshadowed by her more outgoing co-worker, finds an opportunity to make a connection with the robber." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8009314/","name":"Burn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ5Y2MxMTUtZGRiYy00YjAxLWEzNjEtM2I2Y2EzMDI0YjA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a gas station is held at gunpoint by a desperate man in need of cash, a lonely and unstable gas station attendant, tired of being overshadowed by her more outgoing co-worker, finds an opportunity to make a connection with the ro","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8009314/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JasonMcFiggins"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fantastic little thriller","reviewBody":"Tilda Cobham-Hervey as Melinda and Suki Waterhouse as Sheila are extraordinarily in tune with what their characters call for to set Burn out on the unpredictable path it follows. Melinda is a sweetly disturbed, well intentioned, lonely girl who forces awkward moments with customers and who dips her finger in freshly brewed coffee to feel the heat she wishes to have with a man. There's an off kilter emptiness to Melinda that Cobham-Hervey puts front and center with an appropriate misleading elegance, creating a complex and dangerous character in a standout performance. And Waterhouse steals every scene she's in as the wise cracking Sheila who instigates and pushes boundaries with the chip on her shoulder and eye rolling attitude. The 2 are the perfect foil for Josh Hutcherson's Billy, the would be robber who wandered into the wrong gas station. Hutcherson is effective here, perfectly charming and convincingly hot headed when his charm fails him. Burn is a fantastic little thriller that unfolds slowly to reveal a twisted series of events, and its 3 stars are integral to its success in a dialogue heavy script. I don't know if there's good and evil in the gas station where Melinda works, maybe just a thin line in between the 2 extremes and Burn manages to toe that line and explore the grayest areas of life, the purgatory people create for themselves...or find themselves in. It's here where Melinda lives, on the edges of this thin line between good and evil in the seedy gas station of the highway called Paradise Pumps. And if heaven is paradise, this long night at Paradise Pumps proves that paradise is indeed lost. Burn is a great little gem, I hope people check this one out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4112,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-08-23","keywords":"gas","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2433924121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTlkZDQzYTktZTk5YS00NDEzLWJjMGMtMTI3ODQ0M2Q3YWI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTlkZDQzYTktZTk5YS00NDEzLWJjMGMtMTI3ODQ0M2Q3YWI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"A gas-station stickup doesn't go as planned for anyone involved in 'Burn.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5315479/","name":"Tilda Cobham-Hervey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1242688/","name":"Josh Hutcherson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4025229/","name":"Suki Waterhouse"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6120217/","name":"Mike Gan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303286/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177700/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0577945/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6120217/","name":"Mike Gan"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

Hutcherson is effective here, perfectly charming and convincingly hot headed when his charm fails him. I don't know if there's good and evil in the gas station where Melinda works, maybe just a thin line in between the 2 extremes and Burn manages to toe that line and explore the grayest areas of life, the purgatory people create for themselves...or find themselves in. It's here where Melinda lives, on the edges of this thin line between good and evil in the seedy gas station of the highway called Paradise Pumps. And if heaven is paradise, this long night at Paradise Pumps proves that paradise is indeed lost. Burn is a great little gem, I hope people check this one out.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4112,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-08-23","keywords":"gas","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2433924121","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTlkZDQzYTktZTk5YS00NDEzLWJjMGMtMTI3ODQ0M2Q3YWI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTlkZDQzYTktZTk5YS00NDEzLWJjMGMtMTI3ODQ0M2Q3YWI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"A gas-station stickup doesn't go as planned for anyone involved in 'Burn.'","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5315479/","name":"Tilda Cobham-Hervey","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1242688/","name":"Josh Hutcherson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4025229/","name":"Suki Waterhouse"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6120217/","name":"Mike Gan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303286/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177700/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0577945/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6120217/","name":"Mike Gan"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Mike Gan

programme.title: Tõde ja õigus
Prawda i sprawiedliwość
Tõde ja õigus
programme.desc:
Tõde ja õigus: Directed by Tanel Toom. With Priit Loog, Ester Kuntu, Priit Võigemast, Maiken Pius. TRUTH AND JUSTICE is the story of an uncompromising man whose soul is corrupted by the relentless pursuit of his dream." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5593384/","name":"Tõde ja õigus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzhhZjE0ZDMtMjc1Mi00YThkLWI1NmEtMGI2MDdmZjg1NjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"TRUTH AND JUSTICE is the story of an uncompromising man whose soul is corrupted by the relentless pursuit of his dream.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5593384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mvider82"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love it (But Maybe Because I am Estonian)","reviewBody":"For some reason I think think movie with its characters, storyline and background has the biggest effect on Estonians themselves. I just can not imagine the story (or the book that it is based on) has much impact on someone from US, Brazil or Thailand.

It is difficult to explain why the somewhat depressing subject of the film (work, work, work without the reward, redemption and love) is so important for Estonians. It is just part of our cultural narrative and how Estonians view themselves I suppose. So Truth and Justice is one those films that you have to see if you want to get a glimpse into the hard-to-crack soul of our little country and its people.

IMDb data; ttnr: 5593384, Title: Tõde ja õigus, --- Description: Tõde ja õigus: Directed by Tanel Toom. With Priit Loog, Ester Kuntu, Priit Võigemast, Maiken Pius. TRUTH AND JUSTICE is the story of an uncompromising man whose soul is corrupted by the relentless pursuit of his dream." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5593384/","name":"Tõde ja õigus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzhhZjE0ZDMtMjc1Mi00YThkLWI1NmEtMGI2MDdmZjg1NjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"TRUTH AND JUSTICE is the story of an uncompromising man whose soul is corrupted by the relentless pursuit of his dream.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5593384/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mvider82","dateCreated":"2019-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love it (But Maybe Because I am Estonian)","reviewBody":"For some reason I think think movie with its characters, storyline and background has the biggest effect on Estonians themselves. I just can not imagine the story (or the book that it is based on) has much impact on someone from US, Brazil or Thailand.

It is difficult to explain why the somewhat depressing subject of the film (work, work, work without the reward, redemption and love) is so important for Estonians. It is just part of our cultural narrative and how Estonians view themselves I suppose. So Truth and Justice is one those films that you have to see if you want to get a glimpse into the hard-to-crack soul of our little country and its people.

As everyone knows, Estonians do not like to praise (much like the characters in the movie in fact), so the simple fact that everyone I know loves this film, says more about it than any international praise may ever do.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3742,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-02-22","keywords":"pursuit","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Truth and Justice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2864168729","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5MDY0YmItNGZjMC00ZTZiLWI4NDgtZTQ4MWY2ZTZkMDkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5MDY0YmItNGZjMC00ZTZiLWI4NDgtZTQ4MWY2ZTZkMDkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2948384/","name":"Priit Loog","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5334135/","name":"Ester Kuntu","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273350/","name":"Priit Võigemast"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1823803/","name":"Tanel Toom"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088616/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1802885/","name":"Anton Hansen Tammsaare","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1823803/","name":"Tanel Toom"],"duration":"PT2H45M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Tanel Toom

programme.title: Mordene i Kongo
Kongo
Mordene i Kongo
programme.desc:
Mordene i Kongo: Directed by Marius Holst. With Aksel Hennie, Tobias Santelmann, Ine F. Jansen, Dennis Storhøi. In the spring of 2009 two Norwegian adventurers, Joshua French and Tjostolv Moland, are accused of killing their hired chauffeur just before crossing into the eastern Congo. The following manhunt starts a political and diplomatic headache." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7356382/","name":"Mordene i Kongo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmE3ZDcyYzQtNDVlZS00MWQzLThkMzMtYzM5OWJmMjFkYzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODc0OTEyNDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the spring of 2009 two Norwegian adventurers, Joshua French and Tjostolv Moland, are accused of killing their hired chauffeur just before crossing into the eastern Congo. The following manhunt starts a political and diplomatic hea","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7356382/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2019-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"a very special film","reviewBody":"This film is not a documentary, its not a biographical flick either, more a drama of true happenings based on books,interviews,family,friend,and statements given by moland and french, about what happened one fateful night in the jungle of civil war ridden democratic republic of congo in 2009. when launched in norwegian cinemas it recieved mixed to negative reviews by media and made great debate in norwegian public and social media. the main issue were that the filmmakers tried to accentuate mr moland and mr french as heroes.

what my personal view on the story is based on are the plentyful coverage made by norwegian broadcasters from the start til mr french got home to norway in 2017 as a relative free man. i shall also make a note that ive heard stories from personal friends with good connections both to the norwegian military and deep bonds to central african affairs that both mr french and mr moland were adrenalin seekers, well known mercinaries, very well seasoned within weapon use and warfare, and a pretty good example of ''brothers in arms''. if that is correct or not only history will tell, what i felt when the trials rolled on slow congolese pace were pittyness for them and especially their parents and families. so whats wrong or whats right,who knows, only joshua can tell because he is the only survivor of this drama. so i hope the congolese government uses the ransom money paid by the norwegian state to plant some ''joshua trees'' to make the blind man see and eventually climb down and give the victims, including mr moland some piece.

so This is a very inconclusive film when considering the guilt of crimes,that tjostolv moland and joshua french were accused for by congolese criminal courts.

but as a film it delivers brilliant acting, most of all by aksel hennie as mr french, and fulfilled by his coactor Tobias Santelmann as mr moland. the filmographic presentation are very good, the locations and production design are very truthfull and close up to the real world. the sound and some of the shooting scene made me jump on the sofa more than once. so wether you have heard about the case of them two norwegian mercenaries or not and want to enjoy a really well made film on low budget then watch this film by the director Marius Holst and his crew and 30-35 producers, because it makes tension into a new definition. very good and recommended.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1399,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-10-26","keywords":"manhunt,africa,congo,based on real people,based on real person","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0377336/","name":"Aksel Hennie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4083737/","name":"Tobias Santelmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1262180/","name":"Ine F. Jansen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0392319/","name":"Marius Holst"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0207853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0662577/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136790/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7251124/","name":"Stephen Uhlander"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shooter
Strzelec
Shooter
programme.desc:
Shooter: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Mark Wahlberg, Michael Peña, Danny Glover, Kate Mara. A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. After being double crossed for the attempt and on the run, he sets out for the real killer and the truth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0822854/","name":"Shooter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRjMzY0OGItNDc4YS00OGNlLWI3MGYtZjRkNjdiNWUyNDY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. After being double crossed for the attempt and on the run, he sets out for the real killer and the truth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0822854/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DICK STEEL"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Nutshell Review: Shooter","reviewBody":"Never mess with someone who can drop you with his gun from miles away. Snipers somehow has this aura of mystique and sexiness associated with the motto of "one shot, one kill", as exhibited in movies like Enemy at the Gates, or memorable war characters such as in Saving Private Ryan. In Shooter, this gets demystified for a while, hitting home that not only should one be gifted with the pulling of the trigger from incredible distance, a sniper is also a master mathematician, having to compute the trajectory of the round with factors of humidity, wind direction, angle etc just to hit the target.

Mark Wahlberg stars as Bob Lee Swagger, whom director Antoine Fuqua makes him literally walk with a swagger in all the silhouetted slow motion shots. A battle hardened veteran with ghosts from the past (don't they all), he gets tempted back to assist the authorities in order to feed his patriotic adrenaline, only to find himself screwed and framed for a treasonous crime he did not commit. It's cat and mouse as prey becomes hunter, and tries to exact justice and at the same time, to try and prove his innocence. Expect the usual guns, explosions, and plenty of blood and gore.

Shooter plays off like an urban Rambo meeting The Fugitive, only this time Dr Richard Kimble has biceps the size of melons and fights back with deadly accuracy from his rifle. He runs from the authorities, firmly put as the scheming villains involved in shady deals and the existence of a covert group of greed ala X-Files, one of whom is played by Danny Glover, in a rare turn of alignment to the dark side. No self-respecting beefcake wannabe can do without some DIY operation scene to keep alive, or some montage in gathering and making new weapons (pipe bombs, napalm anyone?), and half the time I was wondering about Mark Wahlberg being the quintessential new generation action hero.

Gone are the days when Hollywood action movie were ruled by the Stallone-Schwarzenegger- VanDamme trio, and surprisingly there are no permanent beefcakes who can readily step into and fill the void. Wahlberg has been slowly inching his way in my opinion, though Marky Mark's filmography of The Italian Job, the Planet of the Apes remake, The Perfect Storm and the more recent Four Brothers, do suggest that more should be done to cement this status, hence Shooter. I can't wait for his Brazilian Job to hit the screens, though that one plays more like an Ocean's Eleven rather than the individual one-man-saves-the-world action hero type. The Departed was a vulgar bit role, so that doesn't count.

Antoine Fuqua is no stranger to directing action movies, or movies with the hero caught up against unfair odds. From Training Day to Tears of the Sun, you can see earlier influences creep their way into Shooter, making it a little familiar territory visited. There are many sweeping shots used to try and epic-ize the movie, and set action sequences take priority, reducing character development to the token time available between scenes, and sometimes at the expense of plausibility.

The supporting cast was fun to watch, as Michael Pena (World Trade Center, Crash) almost stole the show with his rookie FBI character being caught up in the wrong place at the wrong time, and almost against his training, wishes and protocol, forms and becomes an important ally for Wahlberg's Swagger. The woman folk however get relegated to backseat roles, as per the usual Fuqua movies with Eva Mendes, Keira Knightley and Monica Belluci. Don't expect Kate Mara or Rhona Mitra to do much. As for the rest, they are your token cardboard characters, there to chew the scene.

Shooter is an action fan's fodder, and it is nothing more than a guilt trip watching a cowboy of a hero mopping up the town's scum, exactly in the way we like to see justice served - without remorse, exacting, and served extremely cold. A satisfying actioner with the usual thrills and spills.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":321345,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-04-18","keywords":"on the run,government agent,sniper,sniper rifle,voyeur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shooter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2928083225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc3N2Q0NjMtNmZiMi00ZDFkLWFiZWEtNzM2NmFkNWI1MWNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc3N2Q0NjMtNmZiMi00ZDFkLWFiZWEtNzM2NmFkNWI1MWNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000242/","name":"Mark Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0671567/","name":"Michael Peña"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593961/","name":"Rhona Mitra"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247024/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501380/","name":"Jonathan Lemkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2394211/","name":"Stephen Hunter"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

Peterson (role=Officer Stanley Timmons), Ned Beatty (role=Senator Charles F. Meachum)

programme.title: Qu'un sang impur..
Komando Breitnera
Qu'un sang impur...
programme.desc: Qu'un sang impur...: Directed by Abdel Raouf Dafri. With Johan Heldenbergh, Linh Dan Pham, Lyna Khoudri, Steve Tientcheu. While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a real powder keg in the hands of the rebels." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9348690/","name":"Qu'un sang impur...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmJhMTI0YWYtMzVjYi00ZjRiLTk1MTAtY2U5ZTRlYjA0NTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIwMzA0NTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a re","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9348690/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent war film","reviewBody":"The films made by the French about the Algerian war were not so numerous. And I guess Rachid Bouchareb would not have given the same product for the same subject, the same topic. Remember what he did with INDIGENES and HORS LA LOI. very good movies but so didactic, features where he told you what to think, where the French were always the evil ones and the Arabs the good ones. Here, nothing like this, and it is made by an Algerian born director, an excellent screen writer too. IMDb data; ttnr: 9348690, Title: Qu'un sang impur.., --- Description: Qu'un sang impur...: Directed by Abdel Raouf Dafri. With Johan Heldenbergh, Linh Dan Pham, Lyna Khoudri, Steve Tientcheu. While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a real powder keg in the hands of the rebels." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9348690/","name":"Qu'un sang impur...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmJhMTI0YWYtMzVjYi00ZjRiLTk1MTAtY2U5ZTRlYjA0NTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIwMzA0NTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"While he is only the shadow of the warrior he was in Indochina, Colonel Paul Andreas Breitner is forced to cross a Algeria at war, in search of his former senior officer: Colonel Simon Delignières, missing in the Aurès Nemencha, a re","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9348690/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent war film","reviewBody":"The films made by the French about the Algerian war were not so numerous. Here, nothing like this, and it is made by an Algerian born director, an excellent screen writer too. There is not such scheme in this awesome, brutal, gritty film, where the evils guys are on both sides. This film shows us how awful was this tragedy. programme.title: Filles de joie

Filles de joie
programme.desc: Filles de joie: Directed by Frédéric Fonteyne, Anne Paulicevich. With Sara Forestier, Noémie Lvovsky, Annabelle Lengronne, Nicolas Cazalé. Everyday, three sex workers cross the border from France into Belgium to practice their trade. At the end of one particularly hot summer, all three share a secret that will bind them together forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11018402/","name":"Filles de joie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVjZGVhYmMtOGUyMi00YTMzLTlhNmQtNWZmYzY2NzkzODJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIxNzQ2ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Everyday, three sex workers cross the border from France into Belgium to practice their trade. At the end of one particularly hot summer, all three share a secret that will bind them together forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11018402/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheHound16"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"An engaging and layered insight to three women making a living","reviewBody":"I wasn't sure what to expect going into this film - I hadn't actually read up on it beforehand, and only knew it was an Oscar contender. After having seen it, I'm very happy I did, and recommend it to others. The acting was utterly superb, from all three stars. The film has a way of introducing and going into each character that I feel worked very well. We basically get the perspective of each character, and any characters we may not initially feel so connected to are quickly given layers as their life is revealed, so that we strongly empathize with them. These characters and their situation are extremely complex, and yet no matter what is done, we end up completely understanding where they are coming from. It's very easy to write certain characters as stereotypes, but nearly everyone in this film is given sufficient depth, which keeps the audience engaged and interested the entire film. The pacing was excellent, all the way through, and I have to really commend the writer for how well-written each scene was. The direction, as well, felt very natural, and fluid, keeping strongly with the tone of the film. All around, I very much recommend this film, and am very happy to see this subject matter be handled so well and compassionately.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":793,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-12","keywords":"prostitution,male frontal nudity,male nudity,female nudity,sex work","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3466837529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzMzA1ZTUtMGFkYS00NzhjLWI1YTktNmI0NjExMWUwOGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzMzA1ZTUtMGFkYS00NzhjLWI1YTktNmI0NjExMWUwOGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271759/","name":"Sara Forestier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527852/","name":"Noémie Lvovsky"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4779334/","name":"Annabelle Lengronne"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0285090/","name":"Frédéric Fonteyne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2973991/","name":"Anne Paulicevich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071388/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048473/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2973991/","name":"Anne Paulicevich"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

At the end of one particularly hot summer, all three share a secret that will bind them together forever.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11018402/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TheHound16","dateCreated":"2021-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"An engaging and layered insight to three women making a living","reviewBody":"I wasn't sure what to expect going into this film - I hadn't actually read up on it beforehand, and only knew it was an Oscar contender. After having seen it, I'm very happy I did, and recommend it to others. The acting was utterly superb, from all three stars. The film has a way of introducing and going into each character that I feel worked very well. We basically get the perspective of each character, and any characters we may not initially feel so connected to are quickly given layers as their life is revealed, so that we strongly empathize with them. These characters and their situation are extremely complex, and yet no matter what is done, we end up completely understanding where they are coming from. It's very easy to write certain characters as stereotypes, but nearly everyone in this film is given sufficient depth, which keeps the audience engaged and interested the entire film. The pacing was excellent, all the way through, and I have to really commend the writer for how well-written each scene was. The direction, as well, felt very natural, and fluid, keeping strongly with the tone of the film. All around, I very much recommend this film, and am very happy to see this subject matter be handled so well and compassionately.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":793,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-12","keywords":"prostitution,male frontal nudity,male nudity,female nudity,sex work","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3466837529","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzMzA1ZTUtMGFkYS00NzhjLWI1YTktNmI0NjExMWUwOGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzMzA1ZTUtMGFkYS00NzhjLWI1YTktNmI0NjExMWUwOGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1271759/","name":"Sara Forestier","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527852/","name":"Noémie Lvovsky","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4779334/","name":"Annabelle Lengronne"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0285090/","name":"Frédéric Fonteyne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2973991/","name":"Anne Paulicevich"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071388/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076118/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048473/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2973991/","name":"Anne Paulicevich"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Frédéric Fonteyne, Anne Paulicevich

programme.title: Hud
Hud, syn farmera
Hud
programme.desc: Hud: Directed by Martin Ritt. With Paul Newman, Melvyn Douglas, Patricia Neal, Brandon De Wilde. Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057163/","name":"Hud","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA3MzFlZDQtNTY3Ny00OTM1LWI1ODctNmE4ZWM5ZTU2MjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057163/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krdement"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forget Paul Newman and focus on Melvyn Douglas","reviewBody":"As a native of West Texas, I think this film is one of the finest in American cinema. You don't watch a movie - you experience a real time and place. I happen to love a bunch of Paul Newman's films (The 3 H's - Hud, Hombre and Harper; Cool Hand Luke; The Sting; The Hustler; The Color of Money...), but I'm not what you'd call a rabid fan. I think he is compelling, but has a fairly limited range. He is perfect in this role, but it isn't much different from The Hustler or Cool Hand Luke. However, watching Melvyn Douglas is like watching somebody that Marty Ritt pulled off of some ranch and filmed in his daily life. His performance is absolutely dead- on. The gravelly drawl, the old boy shuffle, his expression - the way his eyes take in the landscape or gaze intently into a bowl of ice cream while Hud talks - all incredibly REAL! I KNOW those old guys!\n\nMelvyn Douglas is a truly under-appreciated American acting genius whose career spanned over 5 decades. His range is tremendous. This is the same honey-tongued actor who is the perfect comic foil to Garbo's Ninotchka in the '30's (In fact, he is one of her only REPEAT leading men!) And his bluster-filled performance in I Never Sang for My Father (with another modern great, Gene Hackman) is also out of this world! Other commentators have addressed Hud's multi-faceted story and the incredible B&W cinematography. All wonderful - but the next time you watch this true American classic, focus on Douglas' Oscar-winning performance. You will be amazed! (And remind yourself of some of the early roles in romantic comedies - Ninotchka, That Uncertain Feeling, This Thing Called Love or Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House - this same actor performed so well.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Drama","Western"],"datePublished":"1963-05-29","keywords":"rodeo cowboy,neo western,texas,rodeo,jack daniels","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2435365401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002048/","name":"Melvyn Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0623658/","name":"Patricia Neal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0728688/","name":"Martin Ritt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057370/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712419/","name":"Irving Ravetch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290809/","name":"Harriet Frank Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573505/","name":"Larry McMurtry"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tõde ja õigus
Prawda i sprawiedliwość
Tõde ja õigus
programme.desc:
Tõde ja õigus: Directed by Tanel Toom. With Priit Loog, Ester Kuntu, Priit Võigemast, Maiken Pius. TRUTH AND JUSTICE is the story of an uncompromising man whose soul is corrupted by the relentless pursuit of his dream." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5593384/","name":"Tõde ja õigus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzhhZjE0ZDMtMjc1Mi00YThkLWI1NmEtMGI2MDdmZjg1NjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"TRUTH AND JUSTICE is the story of an uncompromising man whose soul is corrupted by the relentless pursuit of his dream.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5593384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mvider82"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love it (But Maybe Because I am Estonian)","reviewBody":"For some reason I think think movie with its characters, storyline and background has the biggest effect on Estonians themselves. I just can not imagine the story (or the book that it is based on) has much impact on someone from US, Brazil or Thailand.

It is difficult to explain why the somewhat depressing subject of the film (work, work, work without the reward, redemption and love) is so important for Estonians. It is just part of our cultural narrative and how Estonians view themselves I suppose. So Truth and Justice is one those films that you have to see if you want to get a glimpse into the hard-to-crack soul of our little country and its people.

As everyone knows, Estonians do not like to praise (much like the characters in the movie in fact), so the simple fact that everyone I know loves this film, says more about it than any international praise may ever do.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3742,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-02-22","keywords":"pursuit","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Truth and Justice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2864168729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5MDY0YmItNGZjMC00ZTZiLWI4NDgtZTQ4MWY2ZTZkMDkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmI5MDY0YmItNGZjMC00ZTZiLWI4NDgtZTQ4MWY2ZTZkMDkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2948384/","name":"Priit Loog"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5334135/","name":"Ester Kuntu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1273350/","name":"Priit Võigemast"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1823803/","name":"Tanel Toom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088616/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1802885/","name":"Anton Hansen Tammsaare"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1823803/","name":"Tanel Toom"}],"duration":"PT2H45M"}</script><metacontent="

Ja nieistniejące
Yo, Imposible
programme.desc: Yo, imposible: Directed by Patricia Ortega. With Lucía Bedoya, Belkis Avilladares, María Elena Duque, Adyane Gonzalez. A young woman discovers she was submitted to several surgeries to correct her intersexual body as a baby. She has to find her own self outside gender binaries." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9321408/","name":"Yo, imposible","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDcxY2IxZWItNTY5MC00MDFkLWExOWItYjczMWE5NGQyOTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg1MDMwMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman discovers she was submitted to several surgeries to correct her intersexual body as a baby. She has to find her own self outside gender binaries.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9321408/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"patrickfilbeck"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Yo, imposible, or maybe trying to ride a wave","reviewBody":"Regardless of the fact that the subject can be interesting and important, this film is simply raking in money on the unreflective course of political correctness of the 2010s and 2020s. Of course, the big money doesn't come about here, but the production is based on such an assessment, for example in the form of crowdfunding. In addition, the characters are pale and very much reduced to their sexual identity. Of course, that's what the film is about, but multifacetedness seems to be a word of yesterday far too often for modern filmmakers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-10-20","keywords":"title directed by female,f rated,triple f rated,female protagonist,no opening credits","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10275870/","name":"Lucía Bedoya"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10275871/","name":"Belkis Avilladares"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5913510/","name":"María Elena Duque"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1952204/","name":"Patricia Ortega"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0260424/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0722760/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2989037/","name":"Enmanuel Chávez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1952204/","name":"Patricia Ortega"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ostatnia wyprawa
Dernière ligne droite
programme.desc: Maria (Luise Wolfram) wyjeżdża z Niemiec, aby odwiedzić w Tel Awiwie swoją kochankę Shirę (Moran Rosenblatt). Dochodzi do zderzenia dwóch skrajnie różnych kultur i obyczajów, a mała, pozornie nic nieznacząca pomyłka staje się przyczyną poważnego zamieszania. Dwie niemal obce sobie rodziny muszą oswoić się z perspektywą wspólnej przyszłości. Wkrótce sytuacja komplikuje się jeszcze bardziej. Film został wyróżniony nagrodą na Jewish Film Festival.

programme.title: Hud
Hud, syn farmera
Hud
programme.desc: Hud: Directed by Martin Ritt. With Paul Newman, Melvyn Douglas, Patricia Neal, Brandon De Wilde. Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057163/","name":"Hud","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA3MzFlZDQtNTY3Ny00OTM1LWI1ODctNmE4ZWM5ZTU2MjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057163/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krdement"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forget Paul Newman and focus on Melvyn Douglas","reviewBody":"As a native of West Texas, I think this film is one of the finest in American cinema. You don't watch a movie - you experience a real time and place. I happen to love a bunch of Paul Newman's films (The 3 H's - Hud, Hombre and Harper; Cool Hand Luke; The Sting; The Hustler; The Color of Money...), but I'm not what you'd call a rabid fan. I think he is compelling, but has a fairly limited range. He is perfect in this role, but it isn't much different from The Hustler or Cool Hand Luke. However, watching Melvyn Douglas is like watching somebody that Marty Ritt pulled off of some ranch and filmed in his daily life. His performance is absolutely dead- on. The gravelly drawl, the old boy shuffle, his expression - the way his eyes take in the landscape or gaze intently into a bowl of ice cream while Hud talks - all incredibly REAL! I KNOW those old guys!\n\nMelvyn Douglas is a truly under-appreciated American acting genius whose career spanned over 5 decades. His range is tremendous. This is the same honey-tongued actor who is the perfect comic foil to Garbo's Ninotchka in the '30's (In fact, he is one of her only REPEAT leading men!) And his bluster-filled performance in I Never Sang for My Father (with another modern great, Gene Hackman) is also out of this world! Other commentators have addressed Hud's multi-faceted story and the incredible B&W cinematography. All wonderful - but the next time you watch this true American classic, focus on Douglas' Oscar-winning performance. You will be amazed! (And remind yourself of some of the early roles in romantic comedies - Ninotchka, That Uncertain Feeling, This Thing Called Love or Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House - this same actor performed so well.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Drama","Western"],"datePublished":"1963-05-29","keywords":"rodeo cowboy,neo western,texas,rodeo,jack daniels","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2435365401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwOTJlMWUtZWIxOS00NTJkLTk0YjUtYjE0MGNlOTZjNTdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002048/","name":"Melvyn Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0623658/","name":"Patricia Neal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0728688/","name":"Martin Ritt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057370/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712419/","name":"Irving Ravetch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290809/","name":"Harriet Frank Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573505/","name":"Larry McMurtry"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nuestras madres
Nasze matki
Nuestras madres
programme.desc:
Nuestras madres: Directed by Cesar Diaz. With Armando Espitia, Emma Dib, Aurelia Caal, Julio Serrano Echeverría. Ernesto is a young anthropologist in Guatemala. One day, while hearing the account of an old woman, he thinks he has found a lead that might guide him to his father, a "guerrillero" who went missing during the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9206516/","name":"Nuestras madres","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk3NDI3MmItYzVmMy00MTFiLThkMGMtNDlkN2M4OGI3NDQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM2NTg3Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ernesto is a young anthropologist in Guatemala. One day, while hearing the account of an old woman, he thinks he has found a lead that might guide him to his father, a "guerrillero" who went missing during the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9206516/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vesperview"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"For a movie titled Nuestras Madres, the mothers aren't really at the helm of it","reviewBody":"I had high expectations for this movie as it generated a lot of buzz for winning the Caméra d'Or at Cannes, however, upon watching the movie you slowly realize that this film is not really about the indigenous mothers who fell victim to the Guatemalan armed conflict, but rather about a young man who works as an anthropologist that has a personal stake for helping these women who are searching for the remains of their loved ones. He really only helps them because he is looking for the remains of his father, all while his own mother tries to deter him from searching for his father as she's keeping a secret from him.

The film is beautifully shot, there is a sequence where the the women are photographed while providing their testimonies which is beautiful, but as I stated previously, the film fails to amplify the voices that give it its title and it failed to do so because it was told through the wrong point of view. It reminds me a little bit of The Help and how Skeeter, a white woman, is the protagonist in a story about black maids suffering from racism. Here you have Ernesto, a male looking for his father's remains, taking center stage in what should be a story about the suffering of these women.

"Mi Padre" would've been a more appropriate title.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":626,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-06-16","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi578141721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmUxOTQwOWQtNGExMy00YTM0LTg2ZjAtNTFjOWQ0ODQzYjE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmUxOTQwOWQtNGExMy00YTM0LTg2ZjAtNTFjOWQ0ODQzYjE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5638007/","name":"Armando Espitia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1756304/","name":"Emma Dib"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11343355/","name":"Aurelia Caal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3969062/","name":"Cesar Diaz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0025947/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0301560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0511943/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3969062/","name":"Cesar Diaz"}],"duration":"PT1H18M"}</script><metacontent="

Yo, Imposible
programme.desc: Yo, imposible: Directed by Patricia Ortega. With Lucía Bedoya, Belkis Avilladares, María Elena Duque, Adyane Gonzalez. A young woman discovers she was submitted to several surgeries to correct her intersexual body as a baby. She has to find her own self outside gender binaries." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9321408/","name":"Yo, imposible","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDcxY2IxZWItNTY5MC00MDFkLWExOWItYjczMWE5NGQyOTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg1MDMwMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman discovers she was submitted to several surgeries to correct her intersexual body as a baby. She has to find her own self outside gender binaries.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9321408/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"patrickfilbeck"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Yo, imposible, or maybe trying to ride a wave","reviewBody":"Regardless of the fact that the subject can be interesting and important, this film is simply raking in money on the unreflective course of political correctness of the 2010s and 2020s. Of course, the big money doesn't come about here, but the production is based on such an assessment, for example in the form of crowdfunding. In addition, the characters are pale and very much reduced to their sexual identity. Of course, that's what the film is about, but multifacetedness seems to be a word of yesterday far too often for modern filmmakers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-10-20","keywords":"title directed by female,f rated,triple f rated,female protagonist,no opening credits","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10275870/","name":"Lucía Bedoya"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10275871/","name":"Belkis Avilladares"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5913510/","name":"María Elena Duque"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1952204/","name":"Patricia Ortega"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0260424/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0722760/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2989037/","name":"Enmanuel Chávez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1952204/","name":"Patricia Ortega"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

Tucked: Directed by Jamie Patterson. With Derren Nesbitt, Jordan Stephens, April Pearson, Steve Oram. TUCKED is a raw and tender drama about an aging 80 year old drag queen who forms an unlikely friendship with a younger queen, both struggling with their own issues of gender identity and mortality. As they discover more about each other, they realize how to truly be themselves. Bones
programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0460627, Title: Bones, --- Description: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107","dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Ian Toynton, Dwight H. programme.desc: Bones: Created by Hart Hanson. With Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne. Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0460627/","name":"Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3ODMxMzM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM1NjU0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0460627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Alison107"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just Hope It Stays On the Air","reviewBody":"I didn't expect to like it as much as I liked it. In fact, it's a sure sign of cancellation how much I like this show. I never like crime shows. My mom loves them, but I find them dull, because they're about plots not characters. This is a crime show about characters (not as good as "The Closer" -- the crime show I adored this summer -- mind you), and I enjoyed it. At times, it seemed far-fetched, and the whole Senator plot-point in the pilot seemed awful easy, but the dialogue worked, the characters intrigue me, and the chemistry is great. I expect good things from it.\n\nAlison"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-09-13","keywords":"forensic anthropologist,investigation,washington d.c.,crime scene investigation,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0221043/","name":"Emily Deschanel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174819/","name":"Michaela Conlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0361274/","name":"Hart Hanson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bones: The Complete Seventh Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi748140825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDA2MGRiODItYWI4Zi00ODdhLTg0OWYtMDQ1NmIyODQ2ZGNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bones: The Complete Seventh Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Equalizer
The Equalizer
Agentka McCall
The Equalizer
programme.desc:
The Equalizer: Created by Andrew W. Marlowe, Terri Edda Miller. With Queen Latifah, Tory Kittles, Adam Goldberg, Lorraine Toussaint. An enigmatic figure who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt11242246/","name":"The Equalizer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3MTgwYWUtMTc2NC00ZDdmLWIyNDAtOGJkNTQyZjM0NDA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An enigmatic figure who uses her extensive skills to help those with nowhere else to turn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11242246/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fredwmeyer2"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This series is all "Tell, Don't Show"... and that's the problem.","reviewBody":"The concept of "show, don't tell" was completely lost on the writers room. Every character had to describe every other character as "the best of the best", "the best the agency ever had", "the best I've ever seen".

If you have to tell your audience someone is the best, then they are probably not. The writers are just getting in their own way with excessive dialogue when some simple staging would allow viewers to come to their own conclusions., Instead, we're being TOLD everything.

Also, Queen Latifah is a good actress. She is, however, remarkably miscast in this series. The writers aren't writing to her strengths-- rock solid persona and strong delivery. Instead, they're trying to portray her as a seasoned fighter and are putting her in scenes where she's shown being physically violent. Those scenes fall flat due to the excessive jump cuts needed to compensate for the actress' lack of natural physicality. The classic 80's series did this well-- writing for McCall as a seasoned veteran in his late 50's vs. a modern spec ops warrior. As such, the original McCall used intimidation more than direct physical violence as his key weapon.

This series could be saved but it needs some heavy reworking. Right now it feels like "Equalizer in Name Only". Branding this as a remake of the original series is a disservice to all involved. Instead, create a brand new character for your very talented lead and stop trying to retread the past.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8316,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-02-07","keywords":"justice,fighter,woman warrior,action heroine,one woman army","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0457796/","name":"Tory Kittles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004965/","name":"Adam Goldberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110950/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0448397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0549256/","name":"Andrew W. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0455944, Title: The Equalizer, --- Description: The Equalizer: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Denzel Washington, Marton Csokas, Chloë Grace Moretz, David Harbour. A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455944/","name":"The Equalizer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MzE2NTk0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTM3NTk1MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455944/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mjacksongta","dateCreated":"2015-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Home Depot EQUALS a bad place to be while on Robert McCall's bad side","reviewBody":"In terms of an action movie I gave the equalizer a 7 but soon after felt the need to watch it again and then upped it to an 8. Why? We'll it's an action movie but yet there's no crazy car chases, there's no bombs or heavy big explosions every where. Really the only action scenes are the fight scenes and even they don't come that often. But when they do come they deliver. Denzel is as awesome as ever in these scenes and the creativity in these scenes are what sets it apart from every other action movie. The main character Robert McCall in an ex specialist of some sort, you don't know what at first but know that he's highly trained in something and is now working as an ordinary man working at Home Depot or home Mart as it is in the movie. He looks like just your every day man but can kill you with just about any everyday weapon. And he does this so calmly that big crazy car scenes and explosions would rake away from his character. A man that takes the bus to come kill a whole gang is pretty bad ass by any standard. \n\nAs always I don't want to give spoilers but I do recommend this as a good wholesome action movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":350274,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-09-26","keywords":"vigilante,prostitute,mysterious past,gangster,ex soldier","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1649060889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NzQyMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NzQyMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5MzgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former black ops commando who faked his death for a quiet life in Boston comes out of his retirement to rescue a young girl and finds himself face to face with Russian gangsters.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631269/","name":"Chloë Grace Moretz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0921013/","name":"Richard Wenk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0805994/","name":"Michael Sloan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2030456/","name":"Richard Lindheim"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Antoine Fuqua
